explanation: [0-0] In an open-air stadium packed with audience, a band is performing in the center of the stage. People are waving their arms, immersed in the music.
[0-4] People are waving their arms and jumping their bodies. The screen slides to the left, and lines of English subtitles appear one after another at the top. People continue to cheer.
